title: That illicit allure
author: VD
content_html: Scott Adams and others have imagined that with the advent of robogirls and virtual sex, the human race is doomed. But in the West, that day may have already dawned.
content_text:
Scott Adams and others have imagined that with the advent of robogirls and virtual sex, the human race is doomed.  But in the West, that day
may have already dawned
.
